import './index.css' import {Component} from 'react' class CoinToss extends Component { render() { let totalCount = 0 let headsCount = 0 let tailsCount = 0 return (

Coin Toss Game

Heads (or) Tails

Total:{totalCount}

Heads:{headsCount}

Tails:{tailsCount}

) } } export default CoinToss
